admin.label: Project Administrator
admin.description: Project Administrators can add users to their Project as well as upload, view, and download any data in their Project's Green Room or Core storage.

contributor.label: Project Contributor
contributor.description: Project Contributors can upload data to their Project's Green Room storage but can only view or download the files uploaded by themselves.

collaborator.label: Project Collaborator
collaborator.description: Project Collaborators can upload and access self-contributed data into Green Room and have full data access in the Project's Core storage.
